/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead, providing shade and adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day, which illuminates the scene with natural light and enhances the colors in the image.
